attributes.action: hold an election, so that we may choose our own leader, rather than have a successor thrust upon us against our will.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the current PM's departure, it is against the interests of the public to allow somebody to take charge without agreement by the population of the UK. Allowing this to go forward will give the successor the opportunity to push their own agenda against the interests of the British people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
